page.title: 03BUSINESSES FLAMBOROUGH AREA
page.content: Apart from the Flamborough village centre shops, there are several other small businesses in the area. There are 3 small building firms which construct houses and flats in the village and surrounding district. Two coal merchants do good trade as there is no gas in the village. In Dog and Duck Square is Boro Works, a rock factory which is quaint and old fashioned inside. There are three motor garages on the southern side of the headland. In Flamborough village centre are four public houses and a resteraunt. Sewerby village has only two shops, a sub Post Office which sells groceries and fancy goods and a fried fish and chip shop. There is a resteraunt and a public house.
